title: How to switch among a number of  simultaneous calls?
answer:
The network should support the call holding function. In the case that a call is held and another call is ongoing:
Press the left soft key to switch/hold directly between two calls. That is, turn the ongoing call into the holding state, and turn the call in the holding state into the call state.
Press the  right soft key to end the ongoing call, and keep the holding call.
Press the left soft key to activate the menu and select Release All to terminate the two calls simultaneously.
